roleset.name: to survey widely
roleset.note: CANVASS-V NOTES: Frames file for 'canvass' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from canvass.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: Mr. Whittle said [0] [private and parochial schools in both states]*-1 will be canvassed [*-1] [*] to see if they are interested in [*-2] getting the programs .
example.arg: [*] to see if they are interested in [*-2]getting the programs
